full_summary:
# Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) Tender Notice

## Title
*   **English:** Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE)
*   **French:** Équipement de charge des véhicules électriques (EVSE)

## Tender Information
### Identification
*   **Reference Number:** MX-22711888753
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** DOC614243789
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-03-21

### Tender Status
*   **Closing Date:** 2023-05-05T14:00:00
*   **Status (English):** Expired
*   **Status (French):** Expiré
*   **Anticipated Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-06
*   **Anticipated Contract End Date:** 2023-05-06

### Procurement Details
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD) *and* Services (SRV)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contracting Entity Information
*   **Entity Name:** Canada Post Corporation
*   **Entity Address:** N0751-2701 Riverside Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0B1, Canada

### Contact Information
*   **Name:** Tender Solicitation Control Officer
*   **Email:** tender.control@canadapost.ca
*   **Phone:** 613-734-7863

## Tender Description
Canada Post is seeking proposals for the supply of Level 2 single or dual plug chargers (Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment, "EVSE") and associated software for battery electric vehicles for its commercial vehicle fleet. The selected supplier(s) shall supply, install, commission, and provide maintenance services and parts throughout the useful life of the EVSE.

Tender documents are available on the SAP Ariba Discovery platform at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359145](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359145). Bidding and documents are also accessible on the Merx website at [http://www.merx.com
